title: As a User, I want a Final Roster flag exported with the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When the Provisional Roster is exported to Excel, there will be "Final Roster?" column included
 - If a player on the Provisional Roster has been added to the Final Roster, this column will display "Y"
 - If a player on the Provisional Roster has not been added to the Final Roster, this column will display "N"

title: Match Modal Results
custom_steps: When the matching modal produces possible matches  we display them sorted by ebis ID. We should display a perfect match first.

title: Match Modal Updates
custom_steps:
Matches producing more than 6 results are not being contained on the match modal. A possible solution would be to implement a scroll bar.

Example of a player that would produce multiple results.
810850
Perez
Rickardo
12/04/2003
Venezuela

title: As a user I want to see document removals tracked on player history
custom_steps: Description: \[label], \[label] deleted

title: Update column sizes on the Staff section of the Provisional
custom_steps:
* Allot more space for Name and Club
* Allot less pace for Position, Org, NPPA, Pants, Jersey, Hat

title: Fed Admin should have access to all versions of a profile
custom_steps:
A Fed Admin should see a Federation Drop Down to toggle between multiple versions of that players profile.

They should only see the Federations they have access to.

An Example Player would be Robert Anderson on Andora, US, etc.  Fed Admin should not have access to his French, German, or Lithuanian profile.

title: Prospective List Sorting - 40-man
custom_steps: When sorting the Prospective Players list the 40-man entries are displayed in between players not on the 40-man. This is happening on ascending and descending sorts

title: Prospective List Sorting - IL
custom_steps:
When sorting the Prospective Players list the IL entries are displayed in between players not on the IL. This is happening on ascending and descending sorts

A 500 is being thrown when sorting by IL placements and exporting.

title: Prospective List Sorting - EBIS ID
custom_steps:
When sorting Prospective Players list by EBIS ID the system seems to be adding a 0 to the end of 5 digit ID's and incorrectly displaying them on the UI.

Note: There will be 7 digit EBIS ID's to consider in the future too.

title: As a developer, I want to ensure that wbc can pass the securityheaders.com test
custom_steps:
One of the tests that our SecOps team would like to have us pass is the one you can find on securityheaders.com.   At the moment, we are graded an "F".  We want to get that at least to "A" if not, "A+".

Acceptance criteria:

DEV, STG, and PROD UI's all pass securityheaders.com test, e,g,

https://securityheaders.com/?q=wbcdev.mlb.com&followRedirects=on
https://securityheaders.com/?q=wbcstg.mlb.com&followRedirects=on
https://securityheaders.com/?q=wbc.mlb.com&followRedirects=on

returns a "A" or better.

title: As a User, I want to be prevent from placing a position player in a pitcher or catcher spot on the Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframes:

Error Pitcher: [https://zpl.io/aR9qLZg|https://zpl.io/aR9qLZg]

Error Catcher: [https://zpl.io/a3dvy7d|https://zpl.io/a3dvy7d]

AC:

* When dragging a player to the final roster, the system will perform a check to compare the player's profile position with the position it's being dragged to
* If the profile position is anything other than LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS, they will not be allowed to be placed in a pitcher box
* If the profile position is anything other than C, they will not be allowed to be placed in a catcher box
* If the check fails, a modal will be returned.  The modal will match the wireframe.
** Selecting a new position will enable the Update Position button(pitching modal only)
** Clicking Update position will save the new position, dismiss the modal and add the player to the relevant final roster block and trigger a green notification â€œPosition updatedâ€￾
** Clicking Back dismisses the modal

title: As a User, I want Minimums for Catchers and Pitchers on Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframes:

Final Roster: [https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l|https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l]

Settings: [https://zpl.io/aw6oonM|https://zpl.io/aw6oonM]



AC:

* On the settings page, we will now show a Minimum box for Pitchers and Catchers on the Final Roster section
* The screen will clearly label minimums and maximums (similar to provisional roster limits)
* There will be red text on the final roster sections when minimums are not met (same way this is handled for staff)
* There will be additional rule checks upon finalizing the roster
** Number of Catchers are below the specified minimum
*** Error Message: â€œThe minimum requirement for Catchers has not been metâ€￾
** Number of Pitchers are below the specified minimum
*** Error Message: â€œThe minimum requirement for Pitchers has not been metâ€￾

title: Update section title alignment on the settings page
custom_steps:
AC:

* The expand/collapse section titles â€œQualifying Tournament Rostersâ€￾ and â€œMain Tournament Rostersâ€￾ should have the same alignment as all other sections within the app.

title: As a BOC User, I want the Rule Checks to Fire when Finalizing the Roster
custom_steps:
AC:

* When the BOC Admin user finalizes a federations roster, rule checks will fire:
** All Players have PPA uploaded
*** Error Message: â€œAll players are required to have a PPA uploadedâ€￾
** All Staff have NPPA uploaded
*** Error Message: â€œAll staff are required to have a NPPA uploadedâ€￾
** Numbers of Players and Staff are above specified Minimums
*** Error Message: â€œThe minimum requirement for staff has not been metâ€￾
** All Pants, Hat, Jersey sizes must be input
*** Error Message: â€œPlayer and/or staff uniform sizes are missingâ€￾
** All Players and Staff must be assigned a number
*** Error Message: â€œPlayer and/or staff uniform numbers are missingâ€￾
* Any failed rule checks will be returned to the user
* The BOC Admin User will have the ability to override any failed rule checks and continue with finalizing the roster

title: As a User, I want to Export the Prospective Players List
custom_steps:
Wire: [https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o|https://zpl.io/aMpOK5o]

* When viewing the Prospective Players List, there will be an export icon, as depicted in the wire
* Clicking the icon will export the Prospective Players List to an Excel file
* The export will have the same population, columns, order, and formatting as the UI

* When viewing the Interest List, there will be an export icon, as depicted in the wire
* Clicking the icon will export the Interest List to an Excel file

title: Matching by name is using contains
custom_steps:
Currently when matching an ebis player by name we're using contains instead of equals. An example would be when entering Adam Lau | United States | 07/05/1994
Sean McLaughlin | United States | 07/05/1994 is listed as a system match

title: Date picker is cut off when creating a new staff member
custom_steps: Screenshot: [https://drive.google.com/open?id=1EJL5egYzw9ycirL4g4hY3f7mYaibjZ14|https://drive.google.com/open?id=1EJL5egYzw9ycirL4g4hY3f7mYaibjZ14|smart-link]

title: Styling Update to Staff Profile
custom_steps:
1. Make the name of the Federation darker to match the other greyed out fields.
2. Remove the dropdown arrow in the greyed out Federation field.

title: Provisional Roster - Club column too small
custom_steps:
AC:

Adjust the column widths or % widths to give more space for the Club column.  Columns like Org, Pos, PPA, Other Docs, Pants, Jersey and Hat do not need as much space allotted.

title: Create proxy user with min required permission set for Dev, Stg, then Prod
custom_steps:
In order to have production fully operational, we will require a proxy user for ebis and ebislink.

I highly recommend we test a new user (NOT test_boc_approver@mlb.com)  in DEV and STG that has the minimum permissions necessary first, then create a similar user in production once we have tested in the lower systems.

title: Security:  WBC should not require AWS_ACCESS_KEY and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_ID, should be using a role
custom_steps:
According to Rob, we should not be requiring the ACCESS_KEY and ACCESS_ID in order to read/write to S3, we should be using a role instead.    Rob points to lineup cards as one possible example to follow.  

This will block production deployment.  

====

AC:

1.) Roles are created for wbc dev, stg, and prod

2.) Roles are attached to the pod

3.) In dev, stg, and prod s3 buckets, policy allows anyone with the respective role to upload/download

4.) Encryption should continue to work

5.) Upload/download should continue to work as is

title: Create production environment for WBC
As a BOC Admin, I want to view a History Tab on the player profile
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):* 

Player History: [https://zpl.io/anePg3l|https://zpl.io/anePg3l]

*AC:*

* There is a new history tab added to a players profile
* Clicking on the tab will display a table per the wireframe
** If the info tab was dirty throw global modal before switching tabs [https://zpl.io/bz6K7Oz|https://zpl.io/bz6K7Oz]
* The table will display the audit history with the most recent event at the top
* Clicking on column headers will sort the table
* Relevant documents will be downloadable next to the description
* If Eligibility was denied the denial reason will display next to the description in a comments bubble
* BOC Admin and Viewers will see a federation toggle with all federations that have a profile for that player in addition to an â€œAll Federationsâ€￾ option
* Fed Team Admins will see a federation toggle with all federations they have permissions for in addition to an â€œAll Federationsâ€￾ option
* Fed Team Viewers will not see a toggle
